contest-event.event-date: Sept. 24, 1927 D National Championship of Great Britain (Crystal Palace) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship The White Rider Crystal Palace (Concert Hall), Crystal Palace Park, Sydenham, County of London, England, UK Prizes: 1st: 100 Pounds plus the 1000 Guinea Trophy 2nd: 50 Pounds plus the Daily Telegraph Challenge Cup 3rd: 30 Pounds 4th: 20 Pounds 5th: 10 Pounds Oct. 14, 2011, 5:06 p.m. Aug. 28, 2013, 1:34 p.m. 1 Carlisle St. Stephens Band William Lowes 2 Callenders Cableworks Band Tom Morgan 3 Carlton Main Frickley Colliery Band Noel Thorpe 4 Westoe Band J.
